verses.verse: All the commandment <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> shall ye observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%>, that ye may live <S%H2421><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%>, and go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And thou shalt remember <S%H2142><s%> all the way <S%H1870><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath led <S%H3212><s%> thee these forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, that he might humble <S%H6031><s%> thee <S%H5254><s%>, to prove thee <S%H3045><s%>, to know what was in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, whether thou wouldest keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, or not.

And he humbled <S%H6031><s%> thee <S%H7456><s%>, and suffered thee to hunger, and fed <S%H398><s%> thee with manna <S%H4478><s%>, which thou knewest <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H1><s%>, neither did thy fathers know <S%H3045><s%>; that he might make thee know <S%H3045><s%> that man <S%H120><s%> doth not live <S%H2421><s%> by bread <S%H3899><s%> only <S%H905><s%>, but by everything that proceedeth <S%H4161><s%> out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> doth man <S%H120><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>.
Thy raiment <S%H8071><s%> waxed not old <S%H1086><s%> upon thee <S%H7272><s%>, neither did thy foot swell <S%H1216><s%>, these forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And thou shalt consider <S%H3045><s%> in <S%H5973><s%> thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, that <S%H376><s%>, as a man chasteneth <S%H3256><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, so Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> chasteneth thee <S%H3256><s%>.
And thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to fear him <S%H3372><s%>.

For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> bringeth <S%H935><s%> thee into a good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, a land <S%H776><s%> of brooks <S%H5158><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, of fountains <S%H5869><s%> and springs <S%H8415><s%>, flowing forth <S%H3318><s%> in valleys <S%H1237><s%> and hills <S%H2022><s%>;

a land <S%H776><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%> and barley <S%H8184><s%>, and vines <S%H1612><s%> and fig-trees <S%H8384><s%> and pomegranates <S%H7416><s%>; a land <S%H776><s%> of olive <S%H2132><s%> - trees <S%H8081><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>;

a land <S%H776><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> scarceness <S%H4544><s%>, thou shalt not lack <S%H2637><s%> anything in it <S%H776><s%>; a land whose stones <S%H68><s%> are iron <S%H1270><s%>, and out of whose hills <S%H2042><s%> thou mayest dig <S%H2672><s%> copper <S%H5178><s%>.

And thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> and be full <S%H7646><s%>, and thou shalt bless <S%H1288><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> for the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which he hath given thee <S%H5414><s%>.

Beware <S%H8104><s%> lest thou forget <S%H7911><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, in not keeping <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and his ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, and his statutes <S%H2708><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>:
lest <S%H398><s%>, when thou hast eaten and art full <S%H7646><s%>, and hast built <S%H1129><s%> goodly <S%H2896><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>, and dwelt therein <S%H3427><s%>;

and when thy herds <S%H1241><s%> and thy flocks <S%H6629><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%>, and thy silver <S%H3701><s%> and thy gold <S%H2091><s%> is multiplied <S%H7235><s%>, and all that thou hast is multiplied <S%H7235><s%>;

then thy heart <S%H3824><s%> be lifted up <S%H7311><s%>, and thou forget <S%H7911><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, who brought thee forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>;

who led <S%H3212><s%> thee through the great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, wherein were fiery <S%H8314><s%> serpents <S%H5175><s%> and scorpions <S%H6137><s%>, and thirsty <S%H6774><s%> ground where was no water <S%H4325><s%>; who brought thee forth <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the rock <S%H6697><s%> of flint <S%H2496><s%>;

who fed <S%H398><s%> thee in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> with manna <S%H4478><s%>, which thy fathers <S%H1><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H6031><s%>; that he might humble thee <S%H5254><s%>, and that he might prove thee <S%H3190><s%>, to do thee good at thy latter end <S%H319><s%>:
and lest thou say <S%H559><s%> in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, My power <S%H3581><s%> and the might <S%H6108><s%> of my hand <S%H3027><s%> hath gotten <S%H6213><s%> me this wealth <S%H2428><s%>.

But thou shalt remember <S%H2142><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, for it is he that giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee power <S%H3581><s%> to get <S%H6213><s%> wealth <S%H2428><s%>; that he may establish <S%H6965><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, as at this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H7911><s%>, if thou shalt forget <S%H7911><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and walk <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> them <S%H7812><s%>, and worship them <S%H5749><s%>, I testify against you this day <S%H3117><s%> that ye shall surely <S%H6><s%> perish <S%H6><s%>.

As the nations <S%H1471><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> maketh to perish <S%H6><s%> before you <S%H6440><s%>, so shall ye perish <S%H6><s%>; because <S%H6118><s%> ye would not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
